mapper.sql: id, staff_no, office_id, name, username, password
mapper.select: select r.english_name from sys_user u left sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.id where u.username=#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select r.permission_identity from sys_user u left sys_user_resource ur on u.id = ur.user_id left sys_resource r on ur.resource_id = r.id where u.username=#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
